about_the_game:
In this first person psychological horror game your concept of what is real will be questioned over and over again while you venture in this old apparently abandoned apartment. Be careful at every corner and every shadow, things may not be what they seem.


SYNOPSIS
As a property management's assistant you have the job to keep the tenants records in order for your manager to access when needed. When one particular tenant, an elderly long time client, stops paying rent and is unreachable through all contact channels your manager suggests to action the police to get the old man evicted, but your heart tells you there is something wrong in this case. Why would someone that pays rent on time for over 20 years suddenly stops and is unreachable?

FEATURES
  • True survival horror experience: You are an office staff, not a fighter. Your only tools are a flashlight and your phone.
  • Graphics: Realistic graphics to make the immersion even more terrifying

name: For Those We Forgot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
